name: Pastelion
description:
Pastelion is my solo developer entry into the Unreal Engine 4 Summer 2019 Gamejam.  I've been leaning the Unreal Engine over the last three months and felt the gamejam would be a great opportunity to push and measure my progress.

Pastelion is a twin stick shooter all about getting the highest score you can.  Its kill or be killed instantly with one hit deaths all around.  Dodge everything.  Collect all the multiplier pips, but don't get trapped as the enemies try to surround you!
